resources.string:
Here are a couple of things you need to do in order to make the most out of your stay in Portland. 

 - Download the PDX Bus app. This app is your guide to Portland's public transportation schedule. 
 
 - Download the TriMet Tickets app. This is how you will buy your public transportation ticket. It will work on all methods of transportation - busses, trains, and trams. You can also buy paper tickets in person.
